articles.description: The transfer deadline is approaching and the rumour mill is in overdrive - who do you want your club to sign?
articles.title: Football news and transfer latest

articles.description: Novak Djokovic will replace young rival Carlos Alcaraz as the men's world number one after a routine win on his US Open return.
articles.title: Djokovic back to world number one after US Open win

articles.description: Bobbi Gibb was denied by a letter and obscured by an image, but has beaten both to be recognised for what she is.
articles.title: 'Incapable' - the woman who raced a lie

articles.description: Spanish prosecutors open a preliminary sex abuse investigation into football federation president Luis Rubiales.
articles.title: Prosecutors open sex abuse investigation into Rubiales

articles.description: Northumbria Police say an investigation has been launched following a violent altercation involving Newcastle captain Jamaal Lascelles.
articles.title: Police investigating altercation involving Lascelles

articles.description: After missing the World Cup through injury, Beth Mead "feels ready to go" and would love to make her England return against Scotland next month.
articles.title: Striker Mead eyes England return against Scotland

articles.description: England can put a disappointing summer behind them and enjoy a positive World Cup, says former international Ugo Monye.
articles.title: England 'capable of delivering' at World Cup

articles.description: Listen to BBC local radio commentary from two semi-finals in the 2023 One-Day Cup.
articles.title: Listen: One-Day Cup semi-finals

articles.description: Four people are arrested for an alleged attempt to sabotage a stage of the Vuelta a Espana, Spanish police said on Tuesday.
articles.title: Four arrested over plot to sabotage Vuelta stage

articles.description: British qualifier Lily Miyazaki earns her first win at a Grand Slam with a confident display against Margarita Betova on day one of the US Open.
articles.title: Britain's Miyazaki wins on US Open debut
